title: Shortmaster
author: Shortmaster
content: I exchange in any bank eu Usdt to EUR tron USDT only accepted.I take 20% fee from deal fast and secure private exchange.For example you sell 100 EUR you get 80eur. All EU sepa area banks and iban transfers.

comments.author: Shortmaster
comments.body: Quote from: alterra57 on June 18, 2023, 03:05:55 PMEscrow?No but maybe If you cover escrow fee becouse we Dont need third party to get involved.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: Quote from: Shortmaster on June 18, 2023, 04:22:11 PMQuote from: alterra57 on June 18, 2023, 03:05:55 PMEscrow?No but maybe If you cover escrow fee becouse we Dont need third party to get involved.Okay, if you don't want a 3rd party to get involved I would assume that you are sending the money first in my bank account and then getting the USDT?

comments.author: paid2
comments.body: Wow 20% of fees ? Why not using Bisq in this case ? Swapping USDT to XMR or BTC and exchanging it via a P2P service would be way cheaper.
